review: this is a movie for the ages. this movie has everything that makes you wonder what the hell farah, the idiot was thinking while making it? it had scenes that make you puke in the middle of the screening. but if you are one of those people who just want to watch a movie, with no other desire in life. even then, this movie will make you question your reasoning ability to the maximum. this movie should be played as warning in bollywood museum on what happens if you have no directorial sense, if script written by class five kids during lunch break, and bad acting could do.

best movie..if you attached emotionally. however this film looks boring in first half...but if you like acting of akshay kumar & akshay khanna -outstanding. & songs are superb!! title song as well " bade dilwala"..
